description: Product Description YOUR ON-THE-GO MAKE UP BAG Our makeup organiser storage bag can lay flat to display all your products & act as a cosmetics mat for convenient touchups. Simply throw in your skin care & travel accessories, close in one swift pull, & you're ready! LAYS FLAT & MAGICALLY ORGANISES ALL Our compact drawstring makeup bag offers flexibility so you can put in more without it getting bulky. It fits all your make up sponges, makeup brush set, skincare beauty products & travel essentials! NO MORE FUMBLING & RUMMAGING Aside from its flat lay design, this make up organiser has all the right compartments. Easily locate & secure your items with two large outer pockets, a zipper pocket, & four elastic holders for makeup brushes. MADE TO LAST Our machine washable makeup storage is made with high-quality materials that offer lasting strength & versatility. Put the hook & loop from the outer pockets together for a barrel-shaped purse or enjoy the soft drawstring bag effect! COMPACT & VERSATILE Our makeup bag adjusts to your needs with a design that fits more without being too bulky. They can either be fastened with a hook & loop to be more structured or let it have more of a soft shape that is perfect for fitting in your bags or suitcases. THE BEST WAY TO STORE YOUR MAKEUP Throw in your beauty essentials & be ready in under a minute. There’s no need to pull out items & fumble around because our bag opens as wide as you need it to for easy access. You’ll also love the pockets & holders for easy organisation & protection for your items. MACHINE-WASHABLE This highly durable makeup bag is made for your convenience, preparation, & keeping your makeup essentials always protected. Simply wipe off dirt & marks or do some deep cleaning by washing it on a gentle cycle & have them good as new again. STYLISH & BESPOKE DESIGNS Pick from a wide range of colours & patterns to suit your style. From classy plains to fun prints, we have it for you! Give fun, thoughtful gifts or collect them all for your every trip.
